title: On the outer
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Alienation (Social psychology)

description: Investigates the plight of two of Sydney's homeless men - one a widower in his sixties, the other a young man in his twenties - against a background of their fellow homeless people and the hostels where they live. Reporter: Richard Oxenburgh. Suitable for upper secondary and tertiary levels.
